name: Roll On Dice
description:
"Roll On Dice"!





Roll On Dice is a pretty simple puzzle game, where you just have to roll on other dices with a 6 sided dice. But it can become quite tricky if you don’t know well your faces. Indeed, in order to beat a dice, you will need to have your top face superior or equal to the one that you are rolling on, otherwise you will break your own…

  • The game has over 50 puzzle levels to beat with this main rolling mechanic
  • The rhythm is pretty relaxing, take your time to solve each level
  • Enjoy the colorful graphics
